Ben gets stuck into island life, from scrubbing boat hulls and hacking through vegetation, to pedalo exercising and home schooling. He questions the unusual family dynamics in this house, and joins his eccentric host to sample his inventions—from a fart machine to cook on, to a computer game based on his life.

programme.title: Lõuna-Korea koos Alexander Armstrongiga
programme.desc: On the last leg of his South Korean adventure, Alexander Armstrong heads to the bustling port of Busan, where South Koreas biggest fish market is to be found. Alexander gets to try some of the weirdest seafood youve ever seen, fresh from the sea, including a couple of sea creatures that are so fresh theyre still moving as he bites into them. The area around Busan is home to a delicious, nutritious and slightly boozy rice wine drink called makgeolli and, after the full-on intensity of modern Seoul, Alexander is delighted to meet a famous brewer who uses an ancient recipe for makgeolli, the basis of which are strange cakes of wheat made by hand or, more precisely, by foot. Hopping 180 miles across the Korea Strait from Busan, Alexander finds himself on South Koreas largest island Jeju, where Alexander meets a famous dyer of cloth who uses only the juice of the persimmon fruit and sunlight to create gorgeous textiles. Jeju is a place where ancient beliefs are still practised by a ritual priest, or shaman, to help people with physical and mental problems. Its a pretty gruelling business being treated by a shaman, but our adventurer has been suffering from insomnia and nows the time to see if the spirit world can help. After an exhilarating climb up the extinct volcano known as Sunrise Peak, the intrepid Mr Armstrong has an appointment to meet the endangered but not at all cuddly Jeju wild dog. By this point, Alexander is so hungry he could eat a horse. So he does, in Jejus premier horsemeat restaurant. Most of it is raw, but hes up to the job, before he finds out what has happened to the puppies of the Jeju wild dogs that would have happily eaten him earlier on.

programme.title: Wonders of the Solar System
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox visits some of the most stunning locations on Earth to describe how the laws of nature have carved natural wonders across the solar system. The worlds that surround our planet are all made of rock, but there the similarity ends. Some have a beating geological heart, others are frozen in time. Brian travels to the tallest mountain on Earth, the volcano Mauna Kea on Hawaii, to show how something as basic as a planets size can make the difference between life and death. Even on the summit of this volcano, Brian would stand in the shade of the tallest mountain in the solar system, an extinct volcano on Mars called Olympus Mons, which rises up 27 km. Yet the fifth wonder in the series isnt on a planet at all. Its on a tiny moon of Jupiter. The discoveries made on Io have been astonishing. This fragment of rock should be cold and dead, yet, with the volcanic landscape of eastern Ethiopia as a backdrop, Brian reveals why Io is home to extraordinary lakes of lava and giant volcanic plumes that erupt 500 km into the sky.

programme.title: Serengeti
programme.desc: Serengetis on head ajad ja toitu jagub kulluses, kuid rida ootamatuid sundmusi poorab loomapered uksteise vastu ning paneb suhted proovile. Vapper emalõvi Kali, kes on reegleid rikkunud ja saanud pojad võõraga, pagendatakse praidist. Kirglik paavian Bakari on nugade peal uue agressiivse karjajuhiga, kes varastas emase, kellesse ta oli kiindunud. Noor huaan Zalika kaotab ema ja peab hakkama karja juhiks, mis on suur vastutus. Teismeeas elevant Tembo otsib oma kohta karjas, kui tema ema toob ilmale uue poja. Kõik need loomad puuavad toime tulla maailmas, mis nende jaoks on pahupidi pooratud.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Jessie Holmes peab vahelduvatest aastaaegadest sammu võrra ees pusima. Ta kavatseb varuda terve aasta jagu puid ja ehitab parve, et palgid koju tuua. Kõik sõltub sellest, kas parv peab koormale vastu. Ricko DeWilde on mitu paeva lastega Huslia looduses veetnud ja neile atapaski tavasid õpetanud. Nuud tuleb tal aga ka endale vajalikke varusid koguda. Hailstoneid ostavad uue paadi, ent katkine mootor takistab kojutulekut. Torm on tõusmas ja teele tuleb asuda veel enne pimedat.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: Ben Fogle explores and follows the same path that various individuals have walked. Having willingly forsaken the luxuries and lifestyle that the modern world has to offer, Ben Fogle explores the less-than-ordinary life that people have swapped to in the wilderness. Many of these destinations are primarily "off the grid" in some of the most remote locations on earth, including Georgia Swamplands USA, Swedish Arctic Circle, Wilderness Island Australia and the Sahara Desert. Men, either alone or with a family, sacrifice the comforts and almost any social life to experience the hardships, challenges and rewards of a life that is constantly challenged by nature and be at one with nature. Being largely dependant on their own abilities, Ben Fogle experiences their way of living for a week to understand the reasons behind why they chose this new way of living. Released on Channel 5 in the UK, Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild was produced by Motion Content Group and Renegade Pictures.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Documentary series. Gregg Wallace follows 27 tonnes of potatoes from a farm in Hampshire through the largest crisp factory on earth, as they are peeled, sliced and fried to make more than five million packets of crisps every 24 hours. Once the crisps are flavoured, they are put into bags in a room with over 100 machines that can fill hundreds of thousands of bags every hour. Greg discovers how each bag is filled with nitrogen to keep the crisps from going stale and how they are distributed. Meanwhile, Cherry Healey discovers the secrets of perfect crisp potatoes, as well the surprising ways that our brain can be tricked into thinking a crisp is much crunchier than it really is. She also finds out how more than a third of savoury snacks consumed in the UK are made from corn and follows the production of Monster Munch. And historian Ruth Goodman investigates who really invented the crisp - was it the Americans, as is often cited, or the British?.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Alaska is one of the least populated states in the US where winter can last up to 9 months and temperatures can drop to below minus 62 degrees Celsius. Life Below Zero follows the lives of seven people as they face the everyday struggles of living in the middle of nowhere with limited resources, battling the elements, frozen terrain and ferocious wildlife, in a fight for survival. Surviving in this merciless land is a test of mental strength as much as it is physical, as the inhabitants must endure crippling isolation and the constant work required, where one wrong decision could cost you your life.

programme.title: Elu allpool nulli
programme.desc: Alaska is one of the least populated states in the US where winter can last up to 9 months and temperatures can drop to below minus 62 degrees Celsius. Life Below Zero follows the lives of seven people as they face the everyday struggles of living in the middle of nowhere with limited resources, battling the elements, frozen terrain and ferocious wildlife, in a fight for survival. Surviving in this merciless land is a test of mental strength as much as it is physical, as the inhabitants must endure crippling isolation and the constant work required, where one wrong decision could cost you your life.

programme.title: Kus on metsikud mehed?
programme.desc: British adventurer Ben Fogle explores the wild side of human nature in this fascinating documentary series, meeting individuals who have given up on the themes of Western society and found home in remote locations across the world. Tired of the pressures, the busyness and the bustle of their societies, these wild guys have dropped everything to set up a new life and concentrate on what they believe matters most.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley Havannas ja Haitil
programme.desc: Naitlejanna ja saatejuht Joanna Lumley kulastab kaht kõige salaparasemat Kariibi mere riiki, Kuubat ning Haitit, ja tutvustab meile nende peidetud parle. 1. osa: Joanna alustab oma seiklust Havanna poksisaalist ja kuuleb noortelt kuubalastelt, mida nemad arvavad elust Kuubal. Tee viib ka suhkrutoostuse edule ehitatud linnakesse, Hemingway lemmikranda ja Santiago de Cubasse, kus tahistatakse revolutsiooni 60. aastapaeva.

programme.title: Kuu imed koos Dara Ó Briainiga
programme.desc: Dara begins his journey by revealing how the moon governs time. Returning to Ireland, near where he grew up, he goes to Newgrange – an ancient archaeological site near the Wicklow Mountains. Its an enormous solar calendar but it is now suggested that the mysterious markings on stones around the site could make it the worlds first lunar calendars too, created by stone-age farmers to help them plan their crops. We discover how much the moon still influences life on earth. Farmer Julian Ellis plans his farming according to the phases of the moon. And we discover how much the moons immense influence on the tides also governs fisherman Sam Jones daily life. Dara next travels to the coasts of Kent to meet astrobiologist Professor Lewis Dartnell to find out just how far the moons influence on life on earth extends. Lewis explains how important the moons pull on the Earths tides has been to evolution for the animals that live in coastal areas but also on human evolution. But does the moon still affect life on earth and directly affect people, as many believe? Dara meets Dr. Rohin Francis to dig deeper into the myths surrounding the moons influence on human behavior, and to discuss some of the latest evidence. But regardless of the myths and legends – the one way the moon undoubtably shaped our history was the race to put a human on the moon. Dara meets Dr Katie Joy who studies moon rocks brought back from the Apollo missions to find out what they discovered from them and are still discovering. Katie explains there is a new race to the moon because, incredibly, locked up in rocks across the lunar surface is believed to be vast amounts of water.

programme.title: Ben Fogle
programme.desc: Interesting documentary series in which Ben Fogle, English broadcaster, writer and adventurer, revisits some of the extraordinary people that were featured in his show Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild- people who have chosen to live in the wild and isolated from society. He will revisit some of Earths most remote locations- remote island in Australia, canyons of Utah, Hungarian countryside, India,... to see how some of them have been getting on since he first met them, did they change their ways and what challenges they have overcome.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: HARDtalk
programme.desc: Stephen Sackur is the main host of the legendary HARDtalk interview programme on a one-on-one basis. He has interviewed prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers. The other presenters are Zeinab Badawi and Sarah Montague. HARDtalk is the proper name for the show, the issues being discussed are very essential and sensitive, and often the questions are not the easiest to answer. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: HARDtalk
programme.desc: Stephen Sackur is the main host of the legendary HARDtalk interview programme on a one-on-one basis. He has interviewed prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers. The other presenters are Zeinab Badawi and Sarah Montague. HARDtalk is the proper name for the show, the issues being discussed are very essential and sensitive, and often the questions are not the easiest to answer. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the worlds most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.sub-title: Love in the Age of Machines
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Bloomberg the Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg
programme.desc: Yvonne Man and David Ingles give global investors unique insight into Chinas economy, with in-depth analysis and conversations with newsmakers.

programme.title: Insight with Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East and Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the regions trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak
programme.desc: Dont miss the latest and most important business news and stories from European markets, Wall Street, because overnight there is morning in Europe and around the world. The programme is hosted by Nejra Cehic, live from London with the help from Manus Cranny and some other hosts.

programme.title: Bloomberg

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. The masked culprits are clearly the childrens parents, faking a heist to teach them a lesson. But when the police get involved for real, it becomes clear the parents arent the ones pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: As night falls in Elmore the Moon takes us on a tour through the various dreams - and nightmares - of the towns slumbering inhabitants. Each characters dream shows us their innermost desires their greatest fears or just how plain weird they are.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin argue with the Internet and make him mad. So mad in fact that he seeks to wipe out humanity and, whilst doing so, malfunctions! The whole of Elmore is plunged into a time before technology. Its actually pretty nice. Will Gumball and Darwin decide to leave the internet unplugged?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin learn that Hector is not so happy being giant-sized. So they decide to help him by creating a potion that will shrink him down to the size of an average person. However creating a magic potion is not as easy as it sounds, and the results can go spectacularly wrong...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Pennys family are unhappy that shes decided to come out of her shell… literally. And Penny wants her family to come out of their shell...also literally. They are at an impasse so who do they turn to in their time of trouble? Gumball of course! Needless to say he is way outside of his comfort zone...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin find themselves in serious trouble when they agree to everything the new kid in school says. The truth is they cant understand a word that he says. Peter Pepperoni has been home schooled and developed a very odd way of speaking. Due to a series of misunderstandings Gumball and Darwin end up on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: To make ends meet, the Wattersons are forced to rent out their house. However with nowhere else to stay they decide to secretly remain at the house. When they accidentally surprise their guests, an elderly pair of fainting goats, they faint...unsurprisingly. The Wattersons fear the worst and attempt to cover up this "accident".

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad misses a package and is forced into an escalating feud with the delivery guy. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Everyone assumes Darwin and Carries relationship is doomed. / The Wattersons play a fantasy role-playing board game to resolve their differences. / Have Gumball and Darwin finally run out of things to say to each other? / Gumball, Darwin and Banana Joe investigate Banana Barbaras mysterious disappearance and uncover an old rivals shadowy scheme in the process. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais and Jamie form an unlikely partnership when theyre accused of a crime they didnt commit. / The Wattersons play a fantasy role-playing board game to resolve their differences. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Dad decides to resolve the Watterson familys differences through the power and magic of his favourite roleplaying game. As they embark on the adventure of a lifetime and battle mythical creatures, will they finally manage to put their differences aside and work together?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The life of the background objects of Elmore are shown in a series of short skits.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are surprised to discover that their past actions have consequences.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids find out Dad has been dressing as a woman. / Gumball and Darwin spice up their friendship by introducing a third best friend... / Gumball has to save Mr Robinsons life during Elmores Senior Talent Show! / Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball has to save Mr Robinsons life during Elmores Senior Talent Show!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball tries to save Darwin from being kissed by a girl.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Principal Brown tries to "fix" Gumballs dysfunctional family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin taunts Gumball about how predictable he is, Gumball tries to prove that he can still surprise his buddy. He thinks that greeting a kid he barely knows with a hug will do the trick. Hes right, Darwin doesnt see it coming. But what Gumball doesnt see coming is the awkward social repercussions of the hug...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are devastated to learn that Mr Robinson - their favourite person in the world - is selling his house and leaving town. When they realise that making some final happy memories with Mr Robinson is not enough for them, they decide to stop him leaving, by sabotaging the sale.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mum and the kids depart for their hard days work, leaving a seemingly lazy Dad half-asleep on the sofa. Mum has given him one very simple job: buy mayonnaise. However, Dad manages to turn this mundane task into an epic quest, showing that his daily routine isnt as inactive as his family imagines.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons arrive at the mall for a day of shopping, they struggle to find a space in the parking lot. They search for a space everywhere - using all their intelligence, cunning and trickery - but as the day goes on, the desperate hunt for a space becomes more important than the trip to the mall itself.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin see an advert for the latest, cutting-edge Bobert operating system and excitedly talk Bobert into downloading it. At first it seems like a massive improvement, but the many flaws in the new operating system become increasingly apparent. After the upgraded Bobert malfunctions one too many times, the kids decide to reinstall his old operating system. But will they be able to downgrade from the upgrade and get their old friend back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and the jewel thief have a lot in common. They are both round and blue. Also they both like accelerating into blind corners. A full-speed collision results in an accidental identity mixup - suddenly the thief finds himself with a real job at the Lab, and poor old Specs is being used as bedding by a hulking prison inmate. When Lamput decides to open up a can of kick-butt, the thief starts to wonder if a life of crime might be safer after all. Specs has no doubt at all where hed prefer to be. Lamput unveils a surprising skill at the kung-fu nerve-pinch. Specs is busted out of the clink, and returns to the life he loves: sprinting alongside his best bud Skinny, constantly failing to catch ol Lamput.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After Gumball convinces himself that Penny doesnt love him as much as she used to, he decides to put together a romantic quest to remind her of all the good times theyve had together. But Gumballs romantic gesture backfires, landing Penny - and maybe their relationship - in serious peril.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig has grown his hair out as an Afro, but it causes problems - with no other choice, he gives himself a really bad haircut. When Craig and his friends decide to build a time machine to fix his mistake, everyone at the Creek thinks that he is a really cool kid named Jacob, and with everyone treating him nicely, Craig begins to ignore Kelsey and JP.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. When the Timekeeper accidentally forgets daylight savings time, the children of the creek all end up getting home late for dinner. Craig and his friends discover that the Timekeeper is missing and decide to take turns replacing her for the next couple of days, but when they realise how difficult and boring it is to keep up with the time, the Stump Kids decide to go look for her.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig learns from Bobby that the Honeysuckle Rangers have invaded his side of the Creek to get his map - after meeting with the Green Poncho, Craig decides to create a fake map for the Rangers to get. When he gives them the wrong one, he and his friends set out to retrieve it... and Craig discovers something personal about them.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig gets conjunctivitis and has to stay at home until it heals - while Duane, Bernard and Jessica head out to the museum, Craigs mum Nicole suggests that she and Craig build a pillow fort. They expand on it and have it spread throughout the house, and as the day goes on, Craig realises that he does not want the day with his mum to end.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: The Titans learn about the magic of soccer. / When Beast Boys head starts to rattle Robin suggests that he should find a hobby so that his brain will stop shrinking. Beast Boy and his brain agree to take up gardening.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Gizmo convinces the Titans hes kidnapped Cyborg, when in reality Cyborgs just hanging out in the HIVE tower with his girl Jinx. When Gizmo gets annoyed by Cyborgs constant presence, the two start a prank war.

programme.title: Totally Spies!
programme.desc: Clover feels that Zerlina doesnt take her seriously as a spy and is determined to prove herself at WOOHP Training Day. But when the simulations go wrong and agents blank out, the Spies realize someone very evil and unexpected is pulling the strings.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin follow Nicole to the Rainbow Factory for Bring your Kids to Work Day. They are expecting a magical place full of dreams and wonder but it turns out to be a little less magical than theyd hoped. Despite the fact nobody wants them there, they end up saving the factory from being closed down.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Courtney gets the old, gross daycare carpet replaced with a new one, the resulting static electricity has unexpected consequences.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into gum volcano.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef warns Beth and Cody making goofy faces into a mirror will cause them to get stuck that way. It turns out he was right, just not in the way any of them ever imagined.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Izzy nominates Chef for the Daycare Professional of the Year award and will do whatever it takes to see him win. As it turns out, it takes a lot.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After Codys best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. With summer almost over, Craig learns that JP is a pro at pencil fighting, a sport that he hates. When JP unwittingly beats the local champion, he is asked to enter a pencil breaking championships to defend the title, but when its made very difficult for JP to do so, Craig becomes invested in the championships and starts supporting his friend.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. On the solemn last day of summer, Stacks contacts the Stump Kids and reveals that she has read through all of the Game Masters journals and discovered a clue that could lead to his forgotten treasure. The kids decide to discover it on their last day and must traverse through a series of underground traps and puzzles that test their abilities to find it.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is assigned to create a poster on what autumn (fall) means to him - thinking that it is boring, he gets support from his mother Nicole, who asks him to talk about what he thinks of when it comes to autumn. Craig then proceeds to recall stories about seasonal desserts, windy hills, moongazing, chapped lips and diving into a pile of leaves.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. It is the Afterschool Snackdown at the Creek, and Craig, Yustice, Angel, Sewer Queen, Faraday and Roger are introducing new snacks to the judges while JP, Kit and Toman figure out which snack gets to be a delicacy for the Trading Tree for a whole month. However, while Craig is happy with his bug-like snacks, he becomes demoralised by everyone elses dishes.

programme.title: Totally Spies!
programme.desc: The Spies embark on the WOOHP EXPRESS with Zerlina, Blaine, Britney and Jerry to protect an uber important WOOHP device in a safe. But Zerlina disappears on the train and now everyone is a suspect as the Spies realize things are not what they seem.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.sub-title: The Inner Beauty of a Cactus
programme.desc: The Titans play "Spin the Bottle.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: The Titans argue on Movie Night.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Beast Boy writes a song for Raven. / Beast Boy goes on tour with his song, but this upsets Raven.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The boys stay up all night, even though the next day theyre supposed to be babysitting Polly - Pennys little sister. Theyre so tired that they manage to lose Polly in the blink of an eye. They desperately look for her, but find themselves in increasingly weird situations every time they accidently nod off.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny might be a man of science, but hes more than happy to get his fortune told for a laugh. The palm-reader sees alarming visions of Skinnys near future; mostly visions that relate to Skinny being squashed, smooshed or otherwise smeared. Its kind of Skinnys own fault; maybe if he paid a bit less attention to chasing Lamput and a bit more attention to not getting squashed, smooshed or smeared, he wouldnt need constant rescuing by a frazzled mystic.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld!

programme.desc: While trying to defend his elite gamer status Chef uses an old cheat code that brings a dangerous avatar to life.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Courtney must deliberately lose a challenge or let the entire world go back in time. Its a hard choice for her.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP. Craig is jealous of the fact that Kelsey and JP have pets to call their own - wanting a pet, he is approached by former Fredite Brigid to join her three-step training programme so that he can own a dog. When nothing seems to be working out for him, the Stump Kids slowly begin to realise that Brigid is taking advantage of them by pampering her.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologise, much to the amazement of the other kids. They use their newly acquired gym skills to save the Coach from being bullied.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Antons little toasty body disintegrates during a swim class. When Gumball and Darwin see Anton the next day, as good as new, they set out to discover his secret. It turns out that his parents use a special formula to bake new Antons when necessary. So the kids test it out at home and end up baking a clone army whose leader - Ant-one - wants to destroy Anton and take over the world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After begging Dad for a puppy, the kids are taken aback when he comes home with a turtle. Despite the fact that the turtle turns out to be extremely aggressive (especially toward Gumball) they try their best to give it the love it deserves. This achieves nothing. The Evil Turtle escapes and goes on a rampage, and they have to find it before it destroys Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom reveals that Gumballs real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family try to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumballs life and erasing his memories. If they cant reach him in time, the old Gumball will disappear forever and theyll be left with Zach!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. An array of diverse characters you may have noticed lurking in the background of Gumball and Darwins adventures finally let their voices be heard. A series of sketches include some tennis crowd extras, two pizzas in love and The Bacon Guy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. Their constant moaning grabs the attention of the good people of Elmore. Mistaking Gumball and Darwin for genuine kids in need, they put on a benefit and raise money for them. How do Gumball and Darwin confess theres been a mix-up without inciting a riot?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins clothes go missing after a swimming lesson, and Gumball is forced to wear a tuxedo from the lost and found office. He believes it makes him look like a certain dapper British secret agent and, together with Darwin and Bobert (and far too many wisecracks) Gumball tracks down the villain responsible for stealing his clothes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When everything goes wrong in Darwins life, he begins to suspect that Gumballs bad influence might be to blame. Darwin decides to go elsewhere for guidance and finds a new mentor in Alan. But maybe its time Darwin started making his own decisions.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin realize that the adult residents of Elmore are dangerously naive when it comes to being safe online. In fact they are in serious need of the boys help with even the simplest of tasks. And no more so than their mom Nicole.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The students of Elmore Junior High find their world turned upside down when the mysterious school superintendent comes to stamp out their cartoonish ways. But who wants to be normal? Certainly not Gumball and Darwin...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When we last saw Gumball, he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote, just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. The remote has now taken Gumball back to the beginning of that disastrous day. Armed with the knowledge of what this day has in store, he must try and stop Rob from destroying his life.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders are hired by Mac and Tosh Gopher to build an underground home for them, but Daffy cant remove rocks from the area fast enough and fails to ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

Bizzy Buzzards mum hires the Looney Builders to build a new nest for her family, but all sorts of problems are created for the crew when Bizzy wants to help but keeps getting in the way.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders are hired by Hoots Talon to expand and paint an old library - they enlist master painter Sylvester for the job, but he must face his fear of heights with the help of his build buddy Tweety if it is to be a success.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery and the amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made Bean opens up his own strange successful coffee bar …

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated. Its up to Morel to step up and finally teach Lilit how to slack-vine like a pro.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes dont listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction. One of them is transformed into a Super Lemming who makes any plant he touches turn into a giant. Grizzy imagines the huge pods his cocoa tree would produce if it were to become giant too.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last helping of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin. A fight breaks out. The rodents are thrown out and land in a dugout canoe filled with traditional fishing gear. Armed with blowpipes, they come back to confront Grizzy, who is ejected in turn. In the canoe, the bear discovers a magic blowpipe.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread. / The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy. / Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar with four wrestling masks inside. Grizzy, two Lemmings and a partridge launch into a pitiless combat.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After a spat over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings find gold leaf-wrapped chocolate bits scattered in the jungle. Delicious! On the backs of a bat and a tapir, the rodents and the bear fight over the harvest of candy. They then realize that the chocolate came from the back of a truck which is losing its cargo. Grizzy and the Lemmings join forces to recover the entire load.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last spoonful of Yummy. Their brawl is interrupted when they happen upon a full crate of chocolate spread in the garage. The rodents snatch the crate and take off on a drone. The bear catches up with them, mounted on the back of a giant bat, but the cargo falls onto the roof of a sacred Mayan temple thats boobytrapped! When they recover the Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings are pursued by a stone giant!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Night has fallen over the jungle and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. When he surprises the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, he catapults the rodents into the distance. The rodents land on a Mayan temple where they discover a magic tiara that can control fireflies. Grizzy, lacking electricity, wants to get the tiara for himself.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans tranquillity is shattered by deafening roadworks outside his bedroom window. Threats, sabotage and subterfuge all fail to quell the cacophony until Bean has the ingenious idea of feeding the workmen into peaceful submission. But the silence ends with a bang!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean likes nothing more than to relax on his sofa with a good meal and his favourite telly programme. Unfortunately, a painful explosion of springs under his bottom puts an end to that. He sets about buying another one… but, alas, sofas are expensive items. TV dinners may well be a thing of the past for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. Mr. Bean finds a treasure map in a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, but its tricky clues lead him up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After a regrettable episode involving his landlady sleepwalking into his room, Mr. Bean suddenly finds himself out on his ear with nowhere to live. Near to tears, he yearns for the cosy familiarity of his old home. A scarecrow and a pair of false teeth come to his rescue.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kas teadsid, et metsas asub imetore Mikumaa, kus elab seenerahvas? Nad on pisikesed metsavalvurid ja igal seenemikul on mingi eriline anne: Mikk-Mikk oskab loodusega suhelda, Lilit sarab eredalt ja Kubarapoisilile jaab kõik hasti meelde. Tule avasta koos nendega loodust ja seelabi ka iseennast! Mikumaal kasvav vana tammepuu, kus seenemikud on alati trallitada armastanud, saab vanaks ja pehkib labi… Mida teha, et vana armas puu paasta? Mikk-Mikk, Lilit ja Kubarapoiss tõttavad vanale sõbrale appi!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: When Fung and Miff spoil Mush-Mushs fun tunnel surprise he has been working on for ages, he wishes their day was ruined too. And then it is, because they are taken by Muddler! Now our Mushlers have to go on a rescue mission to save Fung and Miff.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk, Lilit ja Kubarapoiss paastavad linnumuna mardikate kaest ning toimetavad selle kenasti linnuema juurde tagasi.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss sõbruneb pisimutukaga, kes kardab lennata. Kas tal õnnestub uus sõber lennuhirmust ule aidata?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Sušimuši lusikas laheb katki ja ta otsustab soogitegemisest loobuda. Kas Kubarapoiss, Lilit ja Sepp suudavad kokaameti enda õlule võtta või tuleb Sušikubar kuidagi vana ameti peale tagasi meelitada?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wilhelmina wants a pet and what better pet than Dorothys! While Dorothy is busy on an errand for Queen Ozma, the Monkeys snatch Toto and take him to Wilhelmina, who has a hard time winning Totos affection until she enchants his collar, turning it from ruby red to a pernicious purple. Can Dorothy rescue Toto and prove love is stronger than magic?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Mayor tells Dorothy she must pass the Official Oziam Exam to be able to stay in Oz. Scarecrow tries to tutor her, but an emergency in Munchkinland takes her attention off the books and onto an adventure. She has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Is Dorothy able to help and have time to study? How will she pass the test?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Munchkins are throwing a down-home, country fair in honor of Dorothy. While Dorothy enjoys the pleasures of the fair, Wilhelmina finds a magical locket that allows her to look exactly like whoevers picture she keeps in it (except for a green streak in her hair). Wilhelmina uses it to take the form of Dorothy and crash the fair. With the wicked Dorothy impersonator running about the fair, the Munchkins are appalled that Princess Dorothy is acting so greedy, grabby and ungrateful! The real Princess Dorothy must figure out whats going on and clear her name before the citizens of Oz revoke her Princess-ship.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ozma wants to whip up a snack but has never baked before. Dorothy shows her how to make cookies. But Dorothy accidentally grabs the Potion of Life instead of the vanilla and pours it into the mixing bowl! The hand-mixer spins to life, magically mixing things together as it whizzes around the room. Oh my! The mixer spins out of the palace, mixing everything in its path! Realizing the only way to reverse the mix-up is to reverse the spell, Dorothy and Ozma must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy and the gang need to take a munchkin Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse! As soon as they start their journey, they find out how Ojo the Unlucky earned his name - when they are plagued with the worst bad luck theyve ever seen! From having to cross the Deadly Desert to getting attacked by Orks, its bad luck at every turn. When the Nome King catches them, hes determined to lock them up to keep the bad luck out of his kingdom. But Dorothy reframes their day, realizing it was actually Ojos good luck that got them out of every obstacle.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.
