programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Animated series starring the famous cat and mouse duo. While Rick and Ginger are looking after their adorable niece for the weekend, Rick jokingly puts Spike in charge of keeping the child safe while Ginger goes to the store. Taking his new job seriously, Spike swears that nothing will happen to the baby; naturally, this is where Tom and Jerry arrive on the scene to wreak havoc and make Spikes babysitting job quite possibly his last!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. A lemur belonging to the Duchess adventurous cousin puts Toms job as an under-butler in jeopardy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Detectives try to escort a goofy Canadian goose back across the border between the USA and Canada before duck season begins.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom adopts the attitude of a member of the Royal Guard to keep the mice from wreaking havoc.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput to a haunted mansion populated by ghosts, monsters and all things spooky. Lamput makes quick friends with a ghost prince who happens to be the lord of the mansion, but the Docs run into much less friendlier characters while trying to catch Lamput.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs latest invention generates identical versions of themselves and create a whole mob of "Duplicate" Specs and Skinnies to catch Lamput! However, the device becomes faulty, and the Duplicates cant be turned off. Now the Docs are stuck with annoying copies of themselves who are turning their lives upside down!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl. Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast - unfortunately, the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: The Clunky Card is very different from the other members of the Queens army of Cards. The monarch finally tires of its constant lateness, clumsiness and… crumpledness, and throws it out of her army! Appalled by this injustice, Alice goes all out to help recover the Clunky Cards former status. But does one always necessarily have to be like everyone else in order to be accepted...?

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice comes bursting into Wonderland, eager to get Lewis to try out her new chewing-gums. But the rabbit swallows one sideways and now, every time he talks, gum bubbles come out of his mouth! In the Twins eyes, theres only one cure: Alice must take Lewis to the wild orchard and feed him a fruit from the Balance-y Tree. Easier said than done: Lewis is releasing so much gum that they cant see the trees for bubbles!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie is overcome with feelings of anger after a pigeon messes up her painting. Barney and the kids play Pirates and the Sea Queen to help de-escalate Vivies anger and learn healthy ways to manage big feelings.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: During a picnic in the park, Mel isnt being considerate of the environment around her. Barney transforms the kids into butterflies who can talk to the plants and animals. Mel learns its important to respect and be a caretaker of nature.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel gets angry after accidentally crashing her toy plane into a tree. Barney helps Mel find healthy ways to express her anger and calm down -- and together, they fix her plane.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Like a big brother Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed makes them both breakfast gets Tuffy cleaned up puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol cat to the house next door where Winston waits greeting his students a gaggle of mice including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion and today theyre going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Toms house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom who chooses instead to use the mouses down time to taunt the little guy and eat all of his favorite treats. Jerry resorts to help from Uncle Pecos who, after trying a few Texas remedies, mixes a home brewed Texas tonic to knock the cold p-p-p-plum out. As a side effect of the Tabasco fueled brew, the mouse is breathing fire within minutes. When Tom catches the same cold and gets a dose of the brew, its an all-out flame war! Good thing Uncle Pecos is there to put the fire out!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry have made a connection between a variety of different cases involving the mysterious disappearance of household items -- all including a sighting of a supernaturally cute kitten. Tom and Jerry are on the case! Their investigation reveals a litter of hardened kitten con artists who are using the items theyve taken to form a makeshift home. These kitty criminals are just looking for a home but they dont want to be separated!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks hes pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Toms wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry gets a cold he gets no help from Tom. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerrys help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Toms delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quackers fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are bored. A coconut rolls over to Grizzys feet, pulling the bear out of his state of torpor. He imagines a sort of face on the nut and decides to care for it, like a child with its doll. He has so much fun playing with his new toy that the Lemmings want to join in. But when the bear refuses, the Lemmings ruse: they hide inside other coconuts in hopes of being adopted by Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While bickering with the Lemmings over control of the TV, Grizzy sees an illustration that gives him an idea. In a medical book, a person whose leg is in a cast is being served dinner in front of a TV. Grizzy pretends to have a twisted ankle and shows the Lemmings the patient care illustrations. The imaginary invalid Grizzy is so convincing that the Lemmings fall for the trick. They think that the sooner Grizzy is healed, the sooner they will be able to throw him out of the cabin as planned.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realises its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Further to a misunderstanding, Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. While he looks through the rangers books of fairy tales, searching for a means to return his beloved to her original form, the Lemmings try to recover the frog, with whom they have so much fun playing rodeo games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Joonisfilm raagib grislikarust nimega Grizzy ja mitmest lemmikust.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DONT KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE. Skinnys hiccups dont get better. Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". No point sitting around shedding on the furniture: Specs puts his newly monsterific buddy to good use as a Lamput-hunter. Which goes well until Skinny gets better. If you count being chased off into the distance by an angry bear as "better".

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Beans sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Beans DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentists chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Beans antics?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Boss just happened to capture Lamput last night, so this morning hes on top of the world!! But disaster strikes; during his morning ablutions, the Boss makes a fatal slip of the clippers, and his glorious Tache goes tumbling to the bathroom tiles. Its a catastrophic turn of events for the poor old coot... turns out hes got a raft of deep-seated family issues wrapped up in that white crest of lip-fur. Kindly Lamput takes pity on the poor emasculated Bossman, and helps him sneak back into the lab and get his hands on the tache-restorative formula. It all goes well. Well... well ish. Boss is happy - he gets his glorious mo back. The catch is, literally everyone else does too. You dont really understand someone until youve walked a mile in their tache.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie is overcome with feelings of anger after a pigeon messes up her painting. Barney and the kids play Pirates and the Sea Queen to help de-escalate Vivies anger and learn healthy ways to manage big feelings.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: During a picnic in the park, Mel isnt being considerate of the environment around her. Barney transforms the kids into butterflies who can talk to the plants and animals. Mel learns its important to respect and be a caretaker of nature.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When the Batwheels mysteriously disappear, Bam enlists the help of A.D.A.M. - the original Batmobile - to help save his friends.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Lewis gets a shock when he wakes up one morning and sees all his carrots have been gobbled up overnight! To get to the bottom of it, Alice and Lewis call on the Police Card. Our two heroes accuse Dodson right off the bat: he seems to be the perfect suspect! But then discover the true culprit: a cactus that transforms into a "werewolf cactus" when night falls! And Alice and Lewis are in for a big surprise when they find out who is behind this famished creature!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: While Lewis prepares for the arrival of the Carrot-Grow Cloud (which will triple his carrot harvest), the King almost runs into him with his chariot! Luckily, the rabbit suffered more fear than pain, but the monarch is convinced he was badly affected by this accident! Wanting to do the right thing, he forces Lewis to rest and goes about pampering him. Our rabbit friend doesnt dare contradict him. But the Carrot-Grow-Cloud is approaching, and, at this rate, the King is going to spoil everything! Alice decides to help her friend accomplish his harvesting mission and say "No" to the King, without offending him…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny celebrate a brand new arrival to the family: a body lotion that delivers incredible speed to its wearer. Yay Science! The boys quickly include the speed lotion in their morning routine, because testing inventions on yourself is always a good idea. Then its time to get out there and nab Lamput once and for all. Results are mixed. On the one hand, the "zoom oil" certainly works. On the other hand, these nerds arent really used to having a body that can actually do things. Conclusion: the docs still fail, only this time they fail really quickly. At least they get that round the world trip they were dreaming of.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When an accident leaves Jerry wrapped head to toe in bandages and unable to take his scout troop camping, a guilt-ridden Tom decides to lead the kids into the woods himself. Stuck at home, Jerry cant help but imagine everything that could possibly go wrong.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry must prevent the entire city blowing up.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars Spike steps up and trains Tom and Jerry to be his helpers. At first it seems like they are going to fumble their security jobs but then a burglar proves to be no match for our destructive trio.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput is caught but makes a new friend, Tuzki who comes to his rescue!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero "Super Spy" and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bears Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. / Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert. / Mr Bean inadvertently becomes a teacher. Can he control the unruly class? / Mr Bean finds out he is a Lord and visits his Scottish family home. But keeping a castle is a costly business.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The premiere event on the fashion calendar is about to begin!! The Docs chase Lamput in through the stage door and bring the tone way down. Before you know it everyones embarked upon a short and exceedingly painful catwalk career. This seasons colour: orange. The Docs try their hand at lighting design. They suck at that, too. The blue nerds get ejected hard by venue security, and Lamput becomes the hit look of the show. So versatile! So changeable! One size fits all!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new "friend" has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Determined to finish Beethovens symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra - and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When the frogspawn in Mr. Beans bath hatch out, its the last thing his landlady needs, especially when shes invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that wont stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. / While salmon fishing on the riverbank Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. / With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. / The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. / Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks which he immediately clears out of the cabin his enemies stuck to it like stickers. / The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Before taking a nap, Grizzy locks the food cupboard to prevent the Lemmings from getting into it. And to be sure they cannot force the lock, Grizzy throws all the house tools into the ravine. The Lemmings find a crate of mini building-blocks which enables them to build a hammer... and any other object they wish!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a bottle containing a love potion anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings clumsiness and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him. But the insect can never hold out long enough for the Lemmings to swipe the jar before being knocked out. They decide to give the fly intensive sports training.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the rangers collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call. For Grizzy, its a super-practical way of being waited on by feathered servants, while the Lemmings see it as a golden opportunity to have a squadron which obeys at the drop of a dime.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Nightbike reveals that hes afraid of loud noises, the Batwheels help him overcome his fear so he can stop The Penguin from strealing some valuable cargo.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Santas sleigh is damaged, the Batwheels must help Santa deliver presents to the children of Gotham, and stop the Legion of Zoom from trying to steal them!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. When the Looney Builders are hired by the Mouse Sisters to build a bridge over a macaroni and cheese spill, Lola turns the job into a game that results in the crew losing sight of their bigger goal.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. Mayor Foghorn Leghorn hires the Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a creature called Big Feet.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Animated series for young viewers that follows Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use amazing vehicles to take on the looniest construction jobs while learning lessons along the way. The Looney Builders build a closet for Tibs Squirrel in his tree, but it wont fit Tibs stuff in and he wont get rid of anything.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and cant go fast until it heals. Phooey!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep is over-joyed when his weevil friend, Chase, returns to Mushton. But Chase seems to have changed, hes way harder to handle now. And he wants something from Chep! But what?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mushs knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings dont miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to "gold leaf" the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem - but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr. Bean. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by a rival childs plane, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge - when the next day comes, his newly-constructed fighter plane is almost ready for take-off, but it lacks a vital part and the local model shop is shut! This doesnt matter, though - soon the plane is chocks away with Teddy at the controls and fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Kubarapoiss peab korraldama nii, et Rannutigu Toiduteokotta ara armuks. Kuidas see tal õnnestub?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana toovad Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad koju konna. Mis nao teevad selle peale teised linnaelanikud?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana on Kubaralinnas metsa-vembupaev. Kas Mikk-Mikul ja sõpradel õnnestub keegi haneks tõmmata või lahevad nad hoopis ise õnge?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad on sunnitud Torikut ning Tatikut võõrustama.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Lion (TODD STASHWICK) has the honor being named King of the Forest now that he has his medal of courage. Will his trek out to the forest over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this big scaredy cat or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Its Valentines Day and Dorothy wants to teach the Ozians all about this tradition. Ozma gives her new BFF the perfect Valentines present, a love magnet. However, the magnet magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy. It becomes mayhem when the gift giving and acts of love overwhelm Dorothy. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrows brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelminas clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time. Dorothy playfully calls out jinx. Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow and Tin Man look somber. since in Oz saying jinx sticks. Dorothy and Ozma lose their voices. They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once hes big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the beach, the Lemmings have set up a mini funfair for tourists. Each attraction lets you to win tickets, which are then used to collect prizes from a vending machine. Grizzy, who is not very good at games of skill, steals the tickets collected by the Lemmings in order to obtain the jackpot. The Lemmings decide to create an attraction just for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that oysters can make pearls almost instantaneously: just put an object inside their shell and its automatically coated with mother-of-pearl The game of marbles that the Lemmings have invented with pearls is driving Grizzy crazy. He manages to catapult the Lemmings far away. But at the ocean bottom, they discover a giant oyster. All they need to create a giant-scale marble game!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about their families.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Beans mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to "break" his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After the witches fly into the night, Tom the mouse manages to chase Jerry into a room full of enchanted bottles. When Jerry tries to hide in one of the bottles, he accidentally frees a mischievous thousand-year-old ghost who grants him three wishes.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom finds Butch having a bath upstairs, he gives him the boot. Unfortunately, a ring around tub isnt the only thing the alley cats left behind because now the house is infested with fleas. Its war as Tom, Jerry and Spike must do something to get rid of these pesky little bloodsuckers.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Little Quacker finds that his favorite birdbath is cracked he enlists Jerrys help to get it fixed. They get sidetracked by the scent of Toms delicious chinese takeout. After a battle for the food Tom steals Little Quackers fortune cookie and gets the best fortune ever! Tom sets out into the world with his newfound luck only to be on the receiving end of miserable luck.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Jerry is mistaken for a rare breed of guinea pig by the Duchess friend Professor Dimple, then uses his protected elevated status to create problems for Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. The detectives try to help a team of huskies find the villain determined to sabotage their dog sled race.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry uses a friendly tick to get even with Tom.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput disguises himself as a book and gets returned to the Library, the Docs have to be super quiet in their attempts to get him back. They finally manage to sneak past the Librarian, but all chaos erupts when they open a mysterious book in the restricted area. Lamput and the Docs have to team up to get the new ghostly resident back to where he belongs!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl. When the Joker floods the Batcave, the Batwheels evacuate and relocate to a nearby parking garage - as they adapt to their new home, they learn important lessons about family and making the most of things.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice brings a big shell back from vacation for Lewis. But when she gets to Wonderland, the Queen wants to keep it for herself! So Alice tells her that the shell is, in fact, her crown, meaning she too is a queen! Wonderlands sovereign believes this fib and decides to coach Alice in the art of queenhood, or, more precisely, the Art of Being a Queen of Hearts! Lewis is deeply concerned, for good reason: Alice is playing along with the monarch so much that shes actually starting to act like her!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice hears a noise in her room at night and gets scared. Its Lewis, calling her from Wonderland: he needs to go to the Valley of the Night to harvest some new piano keys and hes scared to go alone. Alice goes with. As they walk through the valley (where its constantly nighttime), they get spooked out by eerie noises… until they realize its just the dark playing havoc with their imagination. But when they get to the Nasty Trees, its a whole different story…

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Davids feeling too quiet to play heroes the same way as Mel and Vivie. Barney helps Mel and Vivie recognize that theres value in all different styles of play and Davids chosen power of quiet observation ends up saving the day.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel is upset that Vivie and Baby Bop wont share the swings with her. Barney encourages Mel to sing about her frustration -- but when Barney asks Mel to share her microphone, Mel realizes that its okay to wait to share until youre ready.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / A Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year. / Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom. / An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing, Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel. Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life. / Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves. / Butch spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom cant pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry whos trying to protect him!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing Tom is writing a novel. Its a mystery novel of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first Tom has fun crafting his own fate but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat Butch is up to no good in the end Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Toms discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its the hottest day ever and Spike is building a swimming pool for his son Tyke. When Tom and Jerry get kicked out of the house for being too destructive Spike enlists their help. Spike must do everything he can from losing his temper in front of Tyke when Tom and Jerry fail to do things the right way.

programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a popcorn party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence truly leaves a lot to be desired. If only it were as clever as the original...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

Skinny sleepwalks into trouble all night, and with Specs gibbering in terror, it falls to Lamput to keep the slumbering nerd out of trouble. Apparently you shouldnt wake sleepwalkers. Turning into a rubber band and flinging them at the moon? Thats fine.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.desc: As Mr Bean settles down to watch his favourite TV programme he hears loud noises from next-door. He moves from house to garden but cant escape the relentless cacophony of trumpets, electric drills, and screaming babies. Beans mind turns to thoughts of revenge….

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whilst trying to redecorate the hall, Bean is obstructed at every turn by his landladys vile one-eyed cat. Bean pops it in the dustbin to keep it out of the way for a while. Just his luck that its rubbish collection day.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Nipping to the shops for a few provisions becomes a nightmare when a mile-long shopping list from his landlady and a clapped out trolley with a wonky wheel conspire to ruin his day. Subscribing to the theory that bigger is better, he constructs his own shopping trolley incorporating a petrol mower, pram wheels and an extra pair of hydraulic hands.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies cant help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landladys jewellery, its not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput likes nothing more than a pleasant evening watching the night sky for UFOs. The peaceful night is ruined, of course, by those pesky Docs. Which is a shame, because its the one night where a UFO actually appears. Of the aliens who emerge from the strange craft, one bears a striking resemblance to Skinny - and naturally theres a bit of a mixup. The alien gets to live life as a Doc at the Lab. Hes pretty good at it, too. Skinny has to make his way as the pilot of a spaceship. Hes pretty bad at it too. In the end, the foreign food is the last straw, and both parties agree to resume their old lives. Lamput goes back to watching the skies.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Davids feeling too quiet to play heroes the same way as Mel and Vivie. Barney helps Mel and Vivie recognize that theres value in all different styles of play and Davids chosen power of quiet observation ends up saving the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Bam is secretly afraid of the dark - much to everyones surprise - but he must conquer his fears if he is to stop Poison Ivy.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But hes so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that hes unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his "rescue missions" for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice decides to accompany Lewis on his trip to deliver vitamins to the Rainbow. Its a pretty risky operation, involving climbing a very long wire, but Lewis is fearless thanks to his "balance button." However, when he drops the button halfway, its panic all round! In the end, thanks to Alice, Lewis realizes that in order to accomplish his mission, he doesnt need to recover his "balance button" after all - he merely needs to restore his self-confidence!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom is jealous that Jerry is having fun on his play date with destiny, so he tries to ruin it.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: An animated series following the antics of a cat named Tom - who is always in pursuit of a mouse named Jerry - and the rivalry between the two characters. Tom adopts the attitude of a member of the Royal Guard to keep the mice from wreaking havoc.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his beloved cat Wilson. Tom is trying to break into the lab to eat Jerry and Napoleon and accidentally gets mistaken for a young Wilson and is taken home. Tom must convince Dr. Bigby hes got the wrong cat! Jerry and Napoleon are left with the real Wilson who is a mean vicious cat.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. Its time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While trying to escape from the Docs at a small sea side town, Lamput meets a lonely sea monster. Lamput attempts to help the sea monster makes friends but all his plans backfires. Now the locals are enraged, and the docs take the opportunity to stir up an angry mob to take down the creature and catch Lamput in the process! Not unless Lamputs new friend has anything to say about it.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. / Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. / Mr Bean finally has a showdown with the mysterious Reliant Robin. Who will be the victor? / Mr Bean has to get the bride to the church on time...anyway he can!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Skinny spruce themselves up and head out to a piano concerto in the royal concert hall. Theyre on their best behavior, until they spot a fellow culture vulture who also happens to be small, orange and squishy. Honestly, theyre letting all sorts of rabble into these places these days. The Docs decide that a sleeping potion might be a quick and quiet way of capturing Lamput. Naturally things get out of hand, and when the entire audience catches a whiff of the snoozy brew, we find out exactly how hard it is to stay awake during a classical music recital. One star.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have adopted a small exotic fish thats lively and affectionate and have fun decorating its aquarium. Jealous, Grizzy finds a fish too, but his is expressionless and indifferent to the bears efforts to communicate. Grizzy plots to exchange the two fish behind the Lemmings backs. He puts the affectionate fish in an even bigger aquarium with a pharaonic decor and locks the lid. But the Lemmings have no intention of leaving their friend to Grizzy.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings use all the cans and tins they can get their hands on to build a beach slide. Grizzy, annoyed at not finding his tinned fish to prepare his meal tray, recovers them from the Lemmings. In their struggle, Grizzy loses his badge! Grizzy and the Lemmings now fight over a valuable metal detector that each party needs to accomplish their goal: build a slide or find the beloved badge.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies - which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queens new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then its going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. Theres prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Beans gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Hes got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Beans heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off so he builds a wind turbine - all fine until theres too much wind! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean is tired of litterbugs and attempts to clean up the whole town himself…with disastrous results. / Mr Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn pest refuses to leave. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mr Bean enters a competition to win a trolley of free food! / Mr Bean meets a soul mate. / Mr Bean makes his own horror movie and ropes in Mrs Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece -featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes "man overboard" and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages the space station. Amongst the debris that falls in front of the cabin, the Lemmings discover a box that cancels out gravity.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magicians hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magicians act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities, one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzys split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After studying a magazine advertisement with a couple standing in front of an SUV, Grizzy imagines that if only he had a nice car, his favorite she-bear would be interested in him. He decides to confiscate the Lemmings crate on wheels and give it a serious overhaul. The Lemmings have nothing against an upgrade, as long as they remain behind the wheel!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While chasing the Lemmings, who stole his jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy crashes into an arcade cabinet near the supermarket which displays a model fortuneteller and her crystal ball. Grizzy realizes that he can foresee events that are going to happen to him in the crystal ball, and namely the traps that the Lemmings have planned for him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A newly unpacked UV tanning booth holds the place of honor in the middle of the cabin. Grizzy gets it into his head that a classy tan will help him draw the attention of the she-bear hes enamored with. When he opens the box, he discovers that the Lemmings have beat him to it and are already playing "beach party" inside the bed.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy who wishes to recover his couch tries to straighten up but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After snagging an ultra-fuel cell upgrade, Penguins Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham - confident leader Bam must now rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo Ducky.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snow crawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a bad guy and Buff sets out to change their minds.
